channel.title: writing on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in writing on un01s notes

item.title: Isolated but still connected
item.description: The internet introduces the digital dimension of our society. Then this pandemic makes isolation often. Only the internet makes it bearable. Yes, we may be isolated from each other but we are still connected in many ways. For example, art is one way to share our common experience in words, melody, shapes and colors. But I am not sure about either NFT or WEB3.

item.title: Mindfulness, Understanding, and Calmness
item.description: The good and the bad are everywhere all the time. While reading stories and watching movies there are always heroes and villains in these endless dramas. There are always Don Quixote and Sancho. What am I? What are you? A mixture of good and bad. That’s all. What if we stop dividing us into black and white? One teaching of Budha is now and here. What does it mean?
